text: Nadia Toffa (June 10, 1979 – August 13, 2019) was an Italian journalist and television presenter. She worked for the satirical current affairs program Le Iene. In 2017, hers was the third most searched-for personal name on Google. Toffa was born in Brescia, Italy. Toffa died on August 13, 2019 from brain cancer at the age of 40.È morta Nadia Toffa ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian writers Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian journalists Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:People from Brescia
title: Nadia Toffa
